import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import './products.scss' import coverPic from '../../assests/images/products.avif' import Card from '../../components/Card/Card' // import { data } from '../../data' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import fetchAPI from '../../services/fetchAPI' const Products = () => { const [selectedRange, setSelectedRange] = useState(4000); const [selectedCatogary, setSelectedCatogary] = useState(['Jackets,Coats']) const [sortyBy, setSortby] = useState() const [data, setData] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { const fechData = async () => { const data = await fetchAPI('http://localhost:4001/getproducts') setData(data.products) } fechData() }, []); const categoryArray = data?.map((item) => item.category) return (

) } export default Products
